'''The Smell of Grilled Mushrooms in the Morning''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Challenger: Series VI]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to defeat 6 [[Fungi]] produced by [[Jadeplume Terrorshroom]] in a Burning state.
